Fifth & Skin
{'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Green Tea', 'Brand': 'Fifth & Skin', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2.5 x 5 inches; 2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'HAFS001', 'UPC': '781549120175 641938663488'}
I received this only a few days ago.  I started using this day and night for the past couple of days and find this has a very nice texture and makes your skin very soft and smooth.  I feel it's a great buy as I believe this is a quality product.  This comes in a nice pump bottle and was surprised of the amount it contained.  I do think over time that there will be cumulative effect which will be more visible.  At this point, it's really a nice product.  I have ultra sensitive skin and found I got no allergic reaction from this as well
A Great Product!  You won't be sorry......

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Concern:** Focused on body confidence, particularly addressing cellulite and improving skin appearance, alongside an expanding interest in facial care for enhanced skin softness and anti-aging benefits.
- **Product Interest:** Demonstrates strong preference for body firming tools that improve skin texture, as well as effective soaps for sensitive skin. Interest in facial serums supports a holistic skincare approach, and there is also a growing appreciation for cosmetics, particularly long-lasting lip products.
- **Recent Interaction:** Recent purchase of a well-regarded lip cosmetic, reflecting an exploration of makeup options that enhance overall appearance while maintaining personal comfort and functionality.
- **Engagement Trends:** Seasonal habits are evident, with increased focus on body and hair care solutions during warmer months, highlighting a desire for comfort and effectiveness in product choices.
- **Review Behavior:** Engages with products thoughtfully and provides detailed feedback based on years of experience, consistently balancing evaluations of product effectiveness with personal expectations.
- **General Attitude:** Open to self-esteem-boosting solutions and values comfort in both clothing and hair care, alongside an interest in makeup that offers longevity.
- **Value Proposition:** Seeks practical benefits centered on appearance and user-friendliness, favoring effective formulations over luxury options.
- **Consumer Behavior:** Prioritizes quality and practicality in body, hair care, and cosmetics, emphasizing a discerning and thoughtful approach to personal care choices. 

This updated profile showcases a commitment to enhancing self-confidence through effective and practical beauty solutions.
